p: Despite screening recommendations, some evidence suggests there are opportunities for improving the percentage of PLWDH who receive syphilis screening. According to data from the United States-based Medical Monitoring Project, only 71% of sexually active MSMLWDH had evidence of being tested for syphilis in the past year.[ 15] In NYS excluding NYC, only about 60% of PLWDH â‰¥19 years of age enrolled in Medicaid were screened for syphilis in the past year.[ 34]
